subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees have insisted for months that their deadline to re-sign Alex Rodriguez is his opt-out date, 10 days after the end of the World Series, but agent Scott Boras does not seem to believe that.
snippet: The Yankees have insisted for months that their deadline to re-sign Alex Rodriguez is his opt-out date, 10 days after the end of the World Series, but agent Scott Boras does not seem to believe that.
